name: Penultimate Fantasy
description: Penultimate Fantasy is a horde hack and slash in which you must defend a mystical artifact from the goblin armies and the undead hordes. You will have both melee and ranged weapons at your disposal. New weapons can be bought from the shop, as well as health potions to heal you up after a tough battle. Magic is another powerful tool, but requires smart mana management. Make sure to defend yourself against special enemy types, each with their own unique abilities! Choose from a variety of characters, each with different perks. We hope you enjoy!
